mapper.select: SELECT i.item_id, i.category_id, i.item_name, i.item_detail, i.price, i.regdate, i.gubun_sub_code, i.stock_number, i.item_sell_status, i.brand, i.is_disabled, c.category_name, im.uuid, im.file_name FROM item i LEFT JOIN category c ON i.category_id = c.category_id LEFT JOIN item_image im ON i.item_id = im.item_id WHERE i.is_disabled = 0 ORDER BY i.item_id

SELECT i.item_id, i.category_id, i.item_name, i.item_detail, i.price, i.regdate, i.gubun_sub_code, i.stock_number, i.item_sell_status, i.brand, i.is_disabled, c.category_name, im.uuid, im.file_name FROM item i LEFT JOIN category c ON i.category_id = c.category_id LEFT JOIN item_image im ON i.item_id = im.item_id WHERE i.item_id = #{itemId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item ( category_id, gubun_sub_code, item_name, item_detail, price, regdate, stock_number, item_sell_status, brand ) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{gubunSubCode}, #{itemName}, #{itemDetail}, #{price}, #{regdate}, #{stockNumber}, #{itemSellStatus}, #{brand})
INSERT INTO item_image (uuid, item_id, file_name) VALUES (#{uuid}, #{itemId}, #{fileName})
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET category_id = #{categoryId}, gubun_sub_code = #{gubunSubCode}, item_name = #{itemName}, item_detail = #{itemDetail}, price = #{price}, stock_number = #{stockNumber}, item_sell_status = #{itemSellStatus}, brand = #{brand} WHERE item_id = #{itemId}
mapper.select: SELECT category_name FROM category WHERE category_id = #{categoryId}
SELECT DISTINCT brand FROM item WHERE brand IS NOT NULL AND brand != ''
SELECT DISTINCT brand FROM item WHERE brand = #{brandName} LIMIT 1

SELECT i.*, c.category_name FROM item i LEFT JOIN category c ON i.category_id = c.category_id WHERE i.item_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{term}, '%') OR i.item_detail LIKE CONCAT('%', #{term}, '%') OR c.category_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{term}, '%') OR i.brand LIKE CONCAT('%', #{term}, '%')
